Package org.opcfoundation.ua.transport.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CertificateValidator
    Certificate Validator estimates the validity of an certificate.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllowAllCertificatesValidator  
    Cert
    Cert is a X509 certificate that contains a public key.
    CertificateValidatorImpl  
    CertValidatorTrustManager
    This class adapts cert validator to trust manager.
    HttpsSecurityPolicy
    Definition of HTTPS Security Policies.
    KeyPair
    Valid and encodeable certificate, including signed public key and private key This class aggregates private and public keys.
    KeyPairsKeyManager
    This class adapts a collection of key pair classes into a X509KeyManager.
    PrivKey
    Valid and encodeable private key.
    SecurityConfiguration
    SecurityConfiguration is binding of local application instance certificate, local private key, remote application instance certificate, security policy and message security mode.
    SecurityConstants  
    SecurityMode
    Binding of SecurityPolicy and MessageSecurityMode.
    SecurityPolicy
    Security Policy determines which algorithms to use during asymmetric and symmetric encryption.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SecurityAlgorithm
    OPC UA specific security algorithm URIs and the respective Java StandardNames
    SecurityAlgorithm.AlgorithmType
